thread.section_title: Trade Tested Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trade Tested | www.tradetested.co.nz
thread.title: Peter and Marilyn Romero
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by Peter and Marilyn Romero

author: Peter and Marilyn Romero
title: Peter and Marilyn Romero
text:
I can recommend Trade Tested , with several purchases we have made through this company we have always had friendly efficient staff take care of our enquiries and arrange for the product to be ready for collection or delivery.
Our latest purchase a 6 tonne log splitter was a breeze to arrange ,pick up and now use.
Good products and great staff are hard to to find with some companies, not so at Trade Tested.
Peter . J. R.
